long_description: Show off your reverence for retro with this rounded cat-eye silhouette. The women's Smith Cheetah Polarized Sunglasses exude youthful energy and an aura of glamour, making them iconic from the get go. Polarized polycarbonate lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Black frames feature gray-green lenses, ideal for medium-to-bright light. Tortoise frames feature brown lenses that enhance your vision in a wide range of light and weather conditions. The Smith Cheetah Polarized Sunglasses feature cellulose propionate nylon frames, adjustable wire-core temples and barrel hinges.
short_description: Show off your reverence for retro with this rounded cat-eye silhouette. The women's Smith Cheetah Polarized Sunglasses exude youthful energy and an aura of glamour, making them iconic from the get go.
